review: My child got limping problem...fever did nt lower fr 12 days....he got red rashes he got post corona symptoms we wer recommended by our pediatric to go to dr.ankit gupta in wockhardt...we admitted our child der...within 2 days my child limping pblm stopped...n fever reduced...Dr.ankit Gupta gav second life to my son...may gopal bless him always üôèhis way of speaking is very patient and polite..means extreme polite....hospital service is excellent...!!

My son had chest pain so we met the doctor. ****** *** **** ***** I would like to recommend this doctor to my family and friends. Painkillers was prescribed by the doctor. Blood test, scanning, MRI was done. There was no waiting time in the hospital. Hospitality was good. Doctor was friendly. Exercise was recommended.

**** **** *** ****** ** not Recommendation to  visited here Very bad expiriance with my child was Admited in Wokcard hospital he done MRI, lambo puncture, sonography ,blood test for my 10 yrs son *** ** ***** ********** ** **** ******* My son Admited 4 dayes in hospital but still problem is same not to cure of Headack, Stomachach, ometing 
   Please im request to all do not visit any how to This place Wokard Hospital mira road

I had been to hospital for my baby as she had infection. ****** *** ***** I have already recommended doctor to my family or friends. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. There was no waiting time in the hospital. Hospitality was good. My baby is good now. Blood tests was also done.
Nice doctor, nice staff ,nice hospital I‚Äôm a delicate and sensitive person, and I was totally impressed He is not only an Excellent Doctor , he is simple

I have visited Dr. Ankit Gupta I took my baby to his doctor is very good he was polite and handled very carefully to my baby overall I felt very good about the doctor, my baby was having fever so visited him, he listened to me very carefully and whatever he prescribed like medicines an all was good he guided me well, he is a good doctor, everything thing was good from hospital to their hospitality everything was good nothing felt bad and the staff and nurses were helpful, he is an experienced doctor he handles the patients good you can visit him whoever is choosing him for their babies as a prediction it's good for them

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
context: stomach and intestinal infections,Pediatrics Critical Care,
review: Heartly thankful to Dr. Ankit who bring my daughter back. Very responsible for treatment very caring. He doesn't research on kids he just diagnose the disease and does exact treatment. If any doctor spoil the case of your child then Dr. Ankit is God for him... Thanks a lot Dr. Ankit.

Doctor was very gentle, he guided us very well, he also gave us diet plan and precautions to take care, experience was very good, i took my daughter for regular checkup. The explanation he gave was understandable and very good at listening to our problem, he is a good Pediatric doctor i would like to recommend

My daughter had met the doctor and it was for health problem. Consultation was good by the doctor. I would like to recommend this doctor to other people if anyone ask. Diet was suggested by doctor. There was some waiting time in the hospital, it was for 15 minutes.
